Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $99.98 - $79.98
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:21:20 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Wonderful Gift & Decoration

LED atmosphere speakers blend well with room decors, it’s a great gift for birthday/housewarming

Torch Light Bluetooth Speakers

Bluetooth speakers with lights easily create you a sweet weekend and romantic evening experience.

Multi-Sync Connection

Sync up to 100 flame Bluetooth speakers together to get a more immersive sound experience.

IPX5 Waterproof

This speaker can stand up to splashes, spills, and light rain. Great for use by the pool or beach.

1 Wonderful Gift & Decors 2 LED Flame Light 3 Multi-Sync Connection 4 IPX5 Waterproof

360° Surround & HD Sound

Enjoy stunningly balanced sound with great clarity thanks to its cutting-edge DSP technology. Pair 2 speakers together to enjoy 360° room-filling sound. Pair more speakers together to get a more immersive sound experience for big events and parties.

Long Last Battery Life

Built-in new upgrade lithium-ion rechargeable battery, KUCCHERO outdoor speaker offers music up to 12 hours per charge and lasts over 24 hours as a table lamp, creating natural & realistic flames, which is perfect for outdoor / indoor decoration.

Premium Bluetooth Version 5.0

Boasting the latest, lightning-fast Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity protocol, the speaker pairs with Bluetooth-enabled devices like smart phones and additional KUCCHERO speakers within a range of 80 feet (no barriers), automatically reconnects to the last device used.

3 Lighting Modes

In flickering flame light mode, natural, realistic dancing flames form a lively campfire atmosphere. In candlelight mode, the breathing light creates a romantic atmosphere and helps users fall asleep faster. In full brightness mode, it adds 360° illumination to your space.

Technical Specifications

Audio Output 10W Distortion < 6% Sound Quality DSP Balanced Technology Connection Type Bluetooth 5.0, Aux Input Lights 3 Modes, 3 Levels of brightness Charing Port Type-C Charging Time 2.5 Hours Product Size 4″ Φ x 7″ H / unit Mounting Mode Hook for Hang, Wall-Mount, Stake

4-in-1 Upgraded Outdoor Bluetooth Speakers – This 360° LED atmosphere speaker combines 4 functions in 1: Portable Wireless Speaker, Atmosphere Lamp, LED Night Light, and Decoration Lantern. Cutting-edge DSP technology gives a well-balanced sound with great clarity. Its crystal clear sound and optional light effects easily set the right atmosphere for any occasion. Perfect for bringing premium music, illumination, and ambiance to your home, party, patio, fire pit, backyard, beach, camping trips
Support Multi-point Connections, Loud 360° Surround Sound – The latest technology allows you to sync up to 100 KUCCHERO flame Bluetooth speakers. Pair 2 speakers together to enjoy 360° room-filling sound. Pair more speakers together to get a more immersive sound experience for big events and outdoor parties
Bluetooth Speakers with Light Show – Press the light button to toggle between 3 different lighting modes or turn the light off. In flickering flame light mode, natural, realistic dancing flames form a lively campfire atmosphere. In candlelight mode, the breathing light creates a romantic atmosphere and helps users fall asleep faster. In full brightness mode, it adds 360° illumination to your space. Warm light makes LED flame speakers nice outdoor Christmas decorations and Christmas gifts
IPX5 Water Resistant – This portable outdoor speaker can stand up to splashes, spills, and light rain. Great for use by the pool or beach. Enjoy crisp, loud and clear music via Bluetooth 5.0 or the AUX jack. With the latest Type-C charging port, you can enjoy loud and clear sound and exciting light effects for hours on a single charge
Wonderful Decoration & Gift Ideas: Portable LED atmosphere Bluetooth speakers blend well with modern room decor and are easy to carry around, making them great camping gifts, housewarming gifts, birthday gifts for men and women, teenage girls and boys. 2 hooks, 2 stakes, and 2 wall mounts are included for easy placement

3 Lighting Modes
